definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: He stepped inside and called for Addie, but heard no reply.
sentences.chinese: 他走進了屋裏的同時向艾迪呼喊，但聽不到一點回應。

sentences.english: The public response from Washington has been a barely-stifled yawn.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的公開回應幾乎像是捂着嘴巴打哈欠。

sentences.english: Jin and the other defendants responded that they did nothing wrong.
sentences.chinese: 金和其他的被告都回應說他們並沒有什麼錯。

sentences.english: If not AFK, many will respond to your greetings.
sentences.chinese: 只要不離開電腦前，您的問候將會得到很多回應。

sentences.english: Would Stoll consider responding directly to his critics on Yelp?
sentences.chinese: 將Stoll直接回應他的批評者認爲對聲嗎？

sentences.english: But there can be no lasting peace without justice, idealists reply.
sentences.chinese: 然而理想主義者回應道，缺少正義的和平也不會持久。

sentences.english: Before I respond, she wriggled the waists whereabouts unknown.
sentences.chinese: 不等我回應，她扭着腰肢不知去向。

sentences.english: Don't respond to retorts that are designed to make you angry. Ignore them.
sentences.chinese: 不要回應那些設法讓你生氣的反駁，忽略它們。

sentences.english: Such defense assistance might well be increased in direct response to the reduction in U.
sentences.chinese: 這些防務援助可能是對美國削減軍事援助的直接回應。

sentences.english: “Oh, I write for Wired, thetechnology publication, ” I chirp.
sentences.chinese: “哦，我爲有線寫作科技方面的文章”，我回應道。

sentences.english: Even when Peter Lovenkrands scored after 13 minutes, there was only a muted response.
sentences.chinese: 即便洛文柯蘭茨13分鐘進球，也只有一點點回應。

sentences.english: That's the evasion, the evasion of skepticism, to which I would offer the following reply.
sentences.chinese: 這就是懷疑論的迴避方式，對此我給予如下回應。

sentences.english: When the gods wish to punish us, they answer our prayers -An Ideal husband, 1893
sentences.chinese: 當神想懲罰我們時，他們就回應我們的祈禱。

sentences.english: Positive brain responses could predict close to one-third of popular songs.
sentences.chinese: 積極的大腦回應能夠成功預言近三分之一的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: Donovan cocked an interrogative eye at his companion, who nodded in reply.
sentences.chinese: 多諾萬向他的同伴投以疑問的眼神，對方點頭回應。

definition: to call into question/to question (truth or validity)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
